mapper.select: select * from user where mobile=#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM USER WHERE nickname LIKE'%我%' OR signature LIKE '%我%' ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM relationship WHERE object_id = user.user_id AND STATUS IN(0,1)) ASC
